statements: SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT name, category FROM recipes WHERE difficulty = 'easy';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE servings >= 4;
SELECT name, duration FROM recipes WHERE duration < 30;
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, category FROM recipes WHERE serving_size >= 4 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time < 30 ORDER BY category;
SELECT name, ingredients, instructions FROM recipes WHERE category = 'Dessert' OR category = 'Appetizer' ORDER BY name;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_recipes FROM recipes GROUP BY category HAVING total_recipes > 2 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id > 3;
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%pasta%';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 2;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%chicken%' ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(*) AS ingredient_count FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id GROUP BY recipes.recipe_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients JOIN recipes ON ingredients.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id WHERE ingredient_name = 'Tomato' ORDER BY ingredient_id ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, recipe_id FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT instruction_id, step_order, description FROM cooking_instructions WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%chicken%' ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT recipes.recipe_name, ingredients.ingredient_name, ingredients.quantity FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id;

SELECT recipes.recipe_name, cooking_instructions.step_order, cooking_instructions.description FROM recipes JOIN cooking_instructions ON recipes.recipe_id = cooking_instructions.recipe_id WHERE recipes.recipe_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_category FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_category = 'Produce';
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS num_ingredients FROM recipe_ingredients GROUP BY recipe_name;
SELECT * FROM instructions WHERE recipe_id = 1 ORDER BY step_number DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_category FROM recipes WHERE recipe_category = 'Dessert' ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredients ON recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Pizza%' AND quantity >= 2;

SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS total_ingredients FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id GROUP BY recipe_name HAVING total_ingredients > 5;
SELECT recipe_name, instruction FROM recipes LEFT JOIN instructions ON recipes.recipe_id = instructions.recipe_id WHERE instruction IS NOT NULL;

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, unit FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredients ON recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE recipe_category = 'Main Course';
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT name, category FROM recipes WHERE servings > 4;
SELECT r.name, i.name AS ingredient, i.quantity FROM recipes r JOIN ingredients i ON r.id = i.recipe_id;
SELECT r.name AS recipe_name, i.step_number, i.description FROM instructions i JOIN recipes r ON i.recipe_id = r.id;
SELECT rc.recipe_id, c.name AS cookware_name FROM recipe_cookware rc JOIN cookware c ON rc.cookware_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE category = 'Dessert';
SELECT name, servings FROM recipes ORDER BY servings DESC;
SELECT r.name, i.name AS ingredient_name, i.quantity FROM recipes r JOIN ingredients i ON r.id = i.recipe_id WHERE r.category = 'Main Course';
SELECT r.name AS recipe_name, i.step_number, i.description FROM recipes r JOIN instructions i ON r.id = i.recipe_id WHERE r.servings > 4;
SELECT r.name AS recipe_name, c.name AS cookware_name FROM recipes r JOIN recipe_cookware rc ON r.id = rc.recipe_id JOIN cookware c ON rc.cookware_id = c.id;
